headline: Is Apple (AAPL) Fairly Priced After Recent Share Price Pullback?
summary: If you are wondering whether Apple’s current share price lines up with its long term appeal, you are not alone. This article is designed to help you connect the story you know with the numbers the market is using. Apple shares last closed at US$259.48, with returns of 4.6% over the past week, a 4.3% decline over the past month, a 4.3% decline year to date, and gains of 10.4%, 70.5% and 94.6% over the last 1, 3 and 5 years respectively. These moves have played out against a steady stream of...
